item.title: Bypassing WAFs
item.description: Have you ever been blocked by a webserver that you are performing pentesting on ? Check out the best techniques used Bypass WAFs and perform your Bug Hunting/ Pentesting without obstacles !

item.title: Attacking GraphQL
item.description: Get started with GraphQL testing from Recon to Exploitation !
